solar_plant.name: Solar Power Station
solar_plant.description: Generates power. (Does not require paper as it is intangible energy).

rendering_plant.description: Processes livestock into glue, lard, and beef. Requires paper for labeling.

paper_mill.name: SymCo Paper Mill
paper_mill.description: Foundation of the economy. High yield; no paper input required to prevent deadlock.

plantation.name: Mixed Fruit & Vegetable Plantation
plantation.description: Grows fruit, vegetables and extracts seeds. Each line requires paper packaging.

grocery_store.name: Local Grocery Store
grocery_store.description: Consumes fresh produce and generates retail revenue.

stationery_store.description: Retail outlet for surplus industrial paper.

textile_and_tannery.description: Processes fibers and hides into textiles and leather goods.

cotton_fields.description: Cultivates raw cotton and collects seeds for replanting.

lumber_mill.description: Processes timber into lumber and sawdust for manufacturing.
